svg.text: BC Gov AI Hub - Each Project Gets Its Own AI Foundry Project + OpenAPI Access
AI Foundry Hub supports multiple Projects. Each project gets its own AI Foundry Project with dedicated API endpoint,
connections, and usage tracking. No custom Gateway Function needed - AI Foundry handles isolation natively!
LAYER 2: AI Foundry Hub (Shared) with Per-Project AI Foundry Projects
Shared Model Deployments (All Projects Access These)
LAYER 3: Project Resource Groups (Connected to AI Foundry Projects)
AI Foundry Project Connection: health-rag → uses shared models
Usage tracked per project via AI Foundry metrics
AI Foundry Project Connection: sdpr-chatbot → uses shared models
Usage tracked per project via AI Foundry metrics
LAYER 4: OpenAPI Access (Each Project Gets Full API Access)
Terraform Module Creates Everything for Each Project
# Creates: RG + AI Foundry Project + Storage + Search + KV + APIM subscription
AI Foundry Project per project = Native isolation + Built-in usage tracking + OpenAPI access out of the box
No custom Gateway Function needed - AI Foundry handles multi-tenancy natively!
